noAdminMessage: This account doesn't have any admin
noUserMessage: This account doesn't have any regular user

chargeReminder.line1: Your on-file credit card will immediately be charged for any changes you make. If you have changed any recurring services, new charges will be pro-rated for your billing cycle.
chargeReminder.line2: Are you sure you want to continue?

unknown.name: Other than above
unknown.help: Please select this option when you want this account to place calls to ANY NUMBER other than mentioned on the list. (When the format of the number is unknown to the system.)

servicePlanReconciliation.tooltip: Insure that the quantities of billable objects are correct.

servicePlanSynchronization.tooltip: Update the billing information on the credit card processor.

servicePlanWizardLegend: Choose a service plan for this account:
servicePlanResellerOnly: Only resellers are allowed to manage service plans.
trunksLegend: Set limits for included simultaneous inbound and outbound calls
twowayTrunkshelp: The number of two-way, flat-rate trunks
inboundTrunkshelp: The number of indbound, flat-rate trunks
outboundTrunkshelp: The number of indbound, flat-rate trunks
callsTrunkshelp: A hard limit for the total number calls
burstTrunkshelp: The number of two-way, flat-rate trunks used only if no other trunks are available
resourceconsumingCallshelp: A hard limit for the number of resource consuming calls (in- and outbound calls together)
callRestrictionsTitle: This account can place calls to...
balanceTooltip: This credit will be used to make per-minute (plan) calls, international calls and receive toll-free calls.
allowPostpay: Allow this customer to go minus on balance todo invoiceing after a period time (Postpay).
allowPrepay: Allow customers to make per-minute calls that go over the above limit, and bill them the per-minute cost of the call. (Prepay)
allowPostpay: Allow this customer to go minus on balance todo invoiceing after a period time (Postpay).
allowPrepay: Allow customers to make per-minute calls that go over the above limit, and bill them the per-minute cost of the call. (Prepay)
havetoPayonnet: Charge also Onnet-calls for this customer, without internal calls (internal extensions)
flatelistTooltip: This list define the flatrate White- and Blacklist for this customer. if activate it, does only use this rules!
flatelist: Activate this white and blacklist for this Customer. if not only systemwide white- and blacklist will be rule!

wizardErrorMessages.accountMandatoryFields: The account name and realm fields are mandatory.
wizardErrorMessages.adminMandatoryFields: The admin first name, last name and email address are mandatory when adding a new admin.
wizardErrorMessages.adminPasswordError: The password must be at least 6 characters long and include a letter and a number.
wizardErrorMessages.adminPasswordConfirmError: The password and its confirmation do not match.
wizardErrorMessages.incorrectBalanceFormat: Incorrect format for balance credit, you can only enter a number with up to 2 decimals.
wizardErrorMessages.balanceMinimumAmount: The minimum amount for balance credit is $5.00.

wizardProcessingMessage2: Please wait while the account is being created.

uiRestrictionsLegend: Select what your customer can view
uiRestrictionsTooltip: When you click on your name from top right corner of the screen, you will see a dropdown menu. You can restrict the view of these options to your Sub-Account by simply uncheck it from account permissions.

deleteAccountDialog.title: Confirmation of Account Deletion
deleteAccountDialog.deleteMessageIntro: This action CANNOT be undone. This will permanently delete the "{{variable}}" account, release all phone numbers, deactivate any mobile devices and remove any provisioning files.
deleteAccountDialog.deleteMessageExplanation: Please type the word "{{variable}}" in the following input and then click on the Delete Account button to proceed.

__comment: UI-1609: Add a way to Remove Credit

updateCreditDialog.title: Update Credits Amount
updateCreditDialog.helpAddCreditOne: By using this, you will add some credits to the balance of this account, which will allow it enable features such as e911 or Caller-ID, but also to place per-minute calls.
updateCreditDialog.helpRemoveCreditOne: We let you remove credits from your sub-accounts with this feature. If you added too many credits to an account, you could fix it by removing the extra credits here for example.
updateCreditDialog.successfulUpdate: Congratulations, you successfuly updated the amount of credits available on that account! :)
